summary: A live concert film documenting the September 1979 "No Nukes" concert at Madison Square Garden. Includes performances by Jackson Browne, Graham Nash, Bonnie Raitt, The Doobie Brothers and Bruce Springsteen.
cast: Jackson Browne|David Crosby|Jane Fonda|John Hall|Chaka Khan|Jody Linscott|Michael McDonald|Graham Nash|Bonnie Raitt|Carly Simon|Bruce Springsteen|Stephen Stills|James Taylor
keywords: new york city|manhattan new york city|rock 'n' roll|nuclear power|rally
director: Directors: Danny Goldberg, Anthony Potenza | 1 more credit Â»
title: No Nukes
